Perceptor:

"Determine the best option for her"say drily the male "Now her =
weapons and beast mode are removed, Hydras wont like that she leave the bas=
e, so her fuction will be more... she wont be a warrior but she will helpfu=
l after all, i was thinking to remove her memories and neutralize het maxim=
al program; with those factors off her consious mind, she will start again.=
.. She will learn whatever we treach her... This will be for her a new begi=
nning, we are jsut recreating her awakening and testing one of several teor=
ies that I have"said Perceptor while he started to downlad a program"As soo=
n as this program is finished, she will wake up... Just think this Rodimus,=
 this is less agressive than a reprogramation and more or less same effects=
; also her signature will be modified and with the time if all is alright s=
he will get a new beast form and a big improvement in her weapons... she wi=
ll become a true warrior not a mere scout".




From: Preston Carroll 
Sent=
: Friday, March 05, 2010 5:44 AM
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
Subject: Re: R=
ecovering Rodimus/BlackFortress


  

Rodimus nodded as he waited for Perce=
ptor to do whatever it is he was
going to do. To make her a Predacon, yes t=
hat 'felt' like the right
thing to do. So why was he he so nervous about it=
? It was as if there
was something inside of him screaming at him to stop a=
ll of this, but
he couldn't hear it.

Rodimus just crossed his arms over hi=
s chest as he watched the pod
slowly start to move, the locks disengaged an=
d the Pod's door opened,
revealing a sleeping Nightlight.

Rodimus' optics =
took in the sight - Her wrists and ankles, they were
still tied up to the p=
od. He shook his head again, this time in
surprise. Nightlight looked so di=
fferent, so thin and pale. Her her
beast had been removed and she definitel=
y looked more humanoid.

"She looks . . . undamaged." Rodimus said, his voi=
ce quiet and
subdued. With her laying there like that, shackled and strippe=
d of her
beast mode, she looked so vulnerable.

"What are you going to do?"=
 Rodimus asked, his voice still quiet and curious.

(TAG)

Preston
(Rodimus=
)
